m_szDocTitle: Tesla Adds Vegan Leather to Model X | News & Opinion  | PCMag.com
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Adds Vegan Leather to Model X Tesla Adds Vegan Leather to Model X The electric car maker now offers a faux leather interior option for the Model X SUV. 0shares Tesla Model X vehicles now come with a new-car smell only a vegan could love. The electric car maker now offers a faux leather interior option on the Model X, as noted by People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA). As Business Insider points out , Tesla has long offered cloth interiors for folks who avoid leather as a lower-level option, but they can now pick fake leather for the high-end SUV, too.
